sentences.sContent: At Qian Hu, we proactively seek opportunities to participate in initiatives to promote philanthropy, business and entrepreneurship in our community.
sentences.sContent_eng: At Qian Hu, we proactively seek opportunities to participate in initiatives to promote philanthropy, business and entrepreneurship in our community.
sentences.sCn: 在仟湖鱼业，我们积极寻求机会来参与各种活动措施，在社会中推广慈善事业、商业和企业家精神。

sentences.sContent: But perhaps nowhere are the roadblocks to youthful enterprise so evident, and the consequences to the Japanese economy so dire, as in the failure of entrepreneurship.
sentences.sContent_eng: But perhaps nowhere are the roadblocks to youthful enterprise so evident, and the consequences to the Japanese economy so dire, as in the failure of entrepreneurship.
sentences.sCn: 但或许年轻人的进取心到处碰壁，这在日本社会已司空见惯。 而缺乏企业家精神，这对日本经济造成了可怕的恶果。

sentences.sContent: However, entrepreneurship is clearly growing on them, as more than a quarter of graduates (26 per cent) reported starting their own company during their EMBA or since graduating.
sentences.sContent_eng: However, entrepreneurship is clearly growing on them, as more than a quarter of graduates (26 per cent) reported starting their own company during their EMBA or since graduating.
sentences.sCn: 然而，学员身上的创业精神明显在增强，超过四分之一的毕业生（26%）称在就读EMBA期间或毕业后创办了自己的公司。

remMethod.val: entrepreneur(企业家) + ship → 企业家精神

trans.tranOther: Entrepreneurship is the state of being an entrepreneur, or the activities associated with being an entrepreneur
